amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to prevent increased barriers to American caregivers, including individuals caring for seniors, children, home care workers, and individuals engaged in the care economy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1644 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 183.

action.text: Amendment SA 1644 proposed by Senator Kim to Amendment SA 1717.
